Mage Hand Tips & Notes

For Arcane Tricksters and Githanki, Mage Hand is summoned with invisible condition. Invisibility is broken when attacking. BUG: If Mage Hand is summoned within range of allied See Invisibility effects, it will force the invisible Mage Hand to make a saving throw to avoid being revealed the moment it's summoned, but will not have to save further.
